creator: steve_l@iseran.com
text:
On Thu, 2 May 2002, Steve Loughran <steve_l@iseran.com> wrote:

> should we make Project.setNewProperty() synchronized on anything.

We better do, same for a couple of other methods (setProperty,
add(Task|DataType)Definition and addReference have similar problems).

Stefan

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
Done. addTask() was actually thread safe already.

will test on the MP-system when I get to work tomorrow.
